title: golang: release notes
body:
The Go release notes are of interest to all Go users, not just Go contributors. On
golang.org, there should be a link to the Go release notes on a page typically
frequented by users, as well as the link on the contributors page.

Request to add a link to Release Notes page to GoLang.org - golang-nuts
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/22cde076bf3b7a31
